Description:

It is the year 1845. You are the world renowned treasure hunter and explorer Max Helsing. In your travels through eastern Europe, you have discovered the ancient and forboding Nightmare Castle!

Myths and legends say that all of the evil monsters of the world would gather there to serve their master, and heed his dark desires. Wealth and riches beyond compare are rumored to be kept within it's cold, stone walls.

Adventurer! Will you not venture forth? Witness the horror, feel your pulse race, your body freeze in fear, as your explore the NIGHTMARE CASTLE!
